sentences.sContent: My hormone balance is disturbed by my pregnancy.
sentences.sCn: 怀孕打乱了我的荷尔蒙平衡。

sentences.sContent: New procedures often disturb the comfortable habits of the workforce.
sentences.sCn: 新的程序常常会打乱职工习以为常的习惯。

synos.tran: 打扰；妨碍；使不安；弄乱；使恼怒

remMethod.val: dis(分开) + turb(搅动) → 搅开了 → 搅乱

words.tran: 扰乱的；为心理失常者而设的

trans.tranCn: 打扰； 搅乱， 弄乱； 使烦恼， 使不安
trans.tranOther: to change a normal situation in a way that causes problems
